items.summary: AdvantageCS, a major subscription billing platform, announced partnership with Revaly to enhance digital payment recovery. Integration provides intelligent retry guidance for failed transactions to reduce involuntary churn.
Global chargebacks volume projected to increase by 41% between 2023 and 2026, from 238 million to 337 million disputes. Creates significant market opportunity for payment recovery solutions.

Visa excessive chargeback threshold will drop from 2.2% to 1.5% for merchants in North America, Europe, and Asia-Pacific starting March 2026. Tighter regulatory environment increases pressure on payment recovery.

Kount (acquired by Equifax 2021) claims 99% fraud decisions delivered in under 400ms, potential to reduce chargeback rates by 72% and false declines by 46%. Strong competitive benchmark for AI-powered fraud prevention.
Industry reports AI-powered smart retries can automatically recover up to 41% of failed payments without coding. Setting market expectations for recovery performance.
Chargebacks911 reports serving over 18,000 companies and notes 72% of merchants experienced increased friendly fraud chargebacks in 2024. Demonstrates scale of chargeback management market.
